Texts.Chs: 凯文！你这小子，把我的实验笔记藏哪里去了！
Texts.Eng: Goddamnit, Kevin! Where did you hide my lab notes?!?!

Texts.Chs: 我怎么可能会痒？我又没有神经末梢。
Texts.Eng: How can I have an itch? I do not possess nerve endings.

Texts.Chs: 我闻起来好像一条咸鱼，这都要怪凯文。
Texts.Eng: I smell like rotting fish. I blame Kevin.

Texts.Chs: 叶族人曾经发誓再也不吃肉肉肉了。不过叶族人想吃凯凯凯文。
Texts.Eng: I ssswears I am reformified and no longer eatsss fleshes of sssentients. Mostly. But Floran wantss to eat Kevin.

Texts.Chs: 我需要更多的测试才能证明我的假设是正确。
Texts.Eng: I'm not quite sure yet, but I think my hypothesis is correct. I must conduct more tests.

Texts.Chs: 为了科学，有时我会在晚上潜入你的房间看着你睡觉。
Texts.Eng: Sometimes I sneak into your ship at night and watch you sleep. For science.

Texts.Chs: 关于健康，最大的敌人就是无聊。
Texts.Eng: There is no greater threat to sanity than boredom. You're boring me.
